name: 神秘世界 Mysterious world
description:
Want to enter the virtual world? Are you playing games in the virtual world now?
This is a puzzle game in a virtual world
It consists of four games with different gameplay. In the game, it constantly challenges high scores,
breaks its own records and strengthens its brain.
A background with music rhythm can bring out a virtual paradise.

This is my first VR game
If you like it
Then, please play it and be happy. And hope you leave a message.
The proceeds from this game will be used in my next game

If you do not like
Then, please submit a refund request in Steam customer service, hope you leave a message to point out the shortcomings, I will correct it.

Guo YuCheng's work I hope you like it
